price: On the Day when He will call out to them, saying, “What response did you give to the messengers?”
arabic: وَيَوۡمَ يُنَادِيهِمۡ فَيَقُولُ مَاذَآ أَجَبۡتُمُ ٱلۡمُرۡسَلِينَ

version.title: English Translation - Rowwad Translation Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Englsih by Rowwad Translation Center in cooperation with Islamhouse.com

meta.transliteration: wayawma yunādīhim fayaqūlu mādhā ajabtumu al-mur'salīna
